title: Can We Get An Electrocution Champion?
body:
https://heymannowyourereallyliving.files.wordpress.com/2010/12/force-lighning.jpg

I always love playing electricity champs in games, escpecially games like Star Wars and Skyrim. But in League there isnt any I believe. 

Thoughts?

replies.body: {{champion:53}}  Fired up and ready to serve.

{{champion:53}} 7

Reporting for duty

{{champion:85}}


Edit: Omg.. forsaken Kennen. Doit RITO!

We need a bonifide pure Lighting Mage. 
No weapon infusion half-measure{{champion:85}} . No generic energy wave{{champion:101}}. 

Give me pure, unadulterated, Thunder and Lightning greatness!

https://i.imgur.com/SkfvZ9a.jpg
Exactly!
Um... Kennen?

CONGRATULATIONS! Youre the 1 millionth person to say that!

https://i.ytimg.com/vi/KjnWKRKkQvo/hqdefault.jpg "Oh Boy what do I win?"

Nothin.
I mean, it's the truth tho.
{{champion:85}} {{champion:101}} ?
Xerath doesn't use lightning, he channels pure arcane energy
To be fair, he does scream **LIGHTNING BOLT**, so the misunderstanding makes sense.
I forgot that, I haven't played him in a long time
We have Kennen, but he has a ninja yordle theme. I do think there is room for another electricity champ, one that plays more of that traditional mage role.

> [{quoted}](name=Bronze GOAT,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ks71H2mx,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2018-01-06T19:31:38.399+0000)
>
> We have Kennen, but he has a ninja yordle theme. I do think there is room for another electricity champ, one that plays more of that traditional mage role.

Yeah totally {{champion:101}} then
Xerath uses Lightning, It honestly just looks like light to me lol.
It's not lightning, it's pure arcane energy

> [{quoted}](name=Bronze GOAT,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ks71H2mx,comment-id=000200000000,timestamp=2018-01-06T19:36:04.301+0000)
>
> Xerath uses Lightning, It honestly just looks like light to me lol.

...Lightning IS an electric current...
Yeah, but Xerath is more just raw arcane power. He was obviously using lightning in his old kit, and he screams about it for the memes, but doesn't actually wield it anymore.

Yeah I forgot about Kennen, but I was thinking of someone more with an electric kinda auto attack. Where its like a constant beam of electricity Auto-attack. And the champ gets like half ad/ap due to his autoattacks being continuous. Just a thought, but Kennen only has electricity in his ult and when he stuns someone. Its not as fun as a full out Electricity champ.

{{champion:85}} {{champion:53}} 
sup.

Not exactly sure what you want to see in an 'electricity champion'. Xerath's gameplay has nothing to do with electricity. Blitzcrank's doesn't either. Neither does kennen. Tbh, Kennen's ultimate is just Zilean's old ulimate. All this electricity is supposed to be told in the particles, not the actual champions' kit. Now I am not one who is good at making kits, but hear me out on this: Making a kit unique and interesting is not easy. 

Does Leona's gameplay have anything to do with the sun? It's pretty much told in the particles. Her ultimate if anything should be an AOE blind instead of a generic stun. Even then, do you feel like you are playing with the sun when you are playing Leona? I sure don't feel like Diana's gameplay has anything to do with the moon either. 

How about Veigar? His gameplay has nothing to do with space. His w has no special effects. His E is just an aoe conditional stun. I don't feel like I'm ammassing tons of power when I'm playing Veigar. Syndra fits this "infinite power' theme better. Her abilities flow better and make sense. 

Wukong is just a generic bruiser. Like he's supposed to be the master escape artist. He's supposed to have transformations, not some clone that sits still and does nothing. Jukes get old and boring. It's time for Riot to rework him and give him a more interesting kit that is versatile and fun to play. 

I know this post isn't cohesive, its all over the place. I'm just saying that instead of making new champions, they need make older champions' kits more interesting. I don't have any ideas for a champions' potential reworks, but it doesn't take a high class chef to know if a dish tastes like shit or not.

{{champion:85}} {{champion:13}} {{champion:53}} {{champion:106}} {{champion:74}} 
You also have a lot of skins like Shockblade{{champion:238}} and Thunderlord{{champion:516}}
Even some of those have lightning in em.
Ryze's magic is just blue
It used to be much more obviously electric themed.
